description: Registration and MultiBlock Library with a bit of rendering

project_page.custom_html:
How to Add Liby to Your Project

Step 1: Add the ModrinthMaven Repository

To download Liby from ModrinthMaven, add the repository to your build.gradle file: 

repositories {
    maven {
        name = "Modrinth Maven"
        url = "https://api.modrinth.com/maven"
    }
}

Step 2: Add the Liby Dependency

  1. Find the Version:
    • Go to the Modrinth project page.
    • Navigate to the version section and choose one that fits your setup.
    • Copy the version number.
  2. Add the Dependency:
    Paste this inside the dependencies block in your build.gradle: 
    dependencies {
    // Add the Liby dependency using the Maven snippet
    modImplementation "maven.modrinth:liby:1.21.1-build-2.1.1"

    // Liby dependency
    implementation "org.reflections:reflections:0.10.2"
}
